a: wallahi haja behya barcha, nns7k biha.
anzel 3al bouton illi fih signal wa stanna chwaya taw ye5dem.
jarreb a3mel restart w nadhif el cache, ken ma mchech chouf ram.
taqs skhoun, rod belek 3ala rou7ek mel chams.
win bedhabt? ab3athli l'erreur taw nchoufha m3ak.
bla mziya khouya, marhbe bik fi ay wa9t.
ey tnajem, amma lazmek tfaragh el solde 9bal ma toufa.
el offre youfa ghodwa nchallah, 7awel estaghelou tawa.
